title: cmd/compile: bad export data for composite literal with elided type
body:
This works:

```
$ cat b.go
package b

type T struct {
}

func F() []*T {
	return []*T{&T{}}
}
$ cat a.go
package a

import "./b"

func F() {
	b.F()
}
$ go tool compile b.go && go tool compile a.go
```

This does not (dropped the unnecessary `&T` in the inner composite literal):

```
$ cat b.go
package b

type T struct {
}

func F() []*T {
	return []*T{{}}
}
$ go tool compile b.go && go tool compile a.go
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0x30 pc=0x2277f0]
```
